A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I waited until I saw it for the third time before giving it a rating.  I love this movie.  Great story with plenty of action.  It is also the most emotional Star Wars movie ever.  The only reason why I give it 4.5 instead of 5 is that it feels fairly disconnected from the greater Star Wars canon (very few links to all of the book\, TV shows\, etc.).
